__e: And to hear you, anyone would think you were pleased about it.
I mean, who would have thought that I'd enjoy living with you, but here we are.
If you just saw me walking down the street you'd think I was a queen. [WHISTLE blowing]
SO WHY SHOULDN'T HE THINK YOU'RE COLORED?
Why would she think you wouldn't want her?
Anyone would think you had eyes in the back of your head.
The way you're talking, a body'd think you owned it.
Oh, you're taking things things on yourself... anybody'd think it were your wedding.
Beside you guys, who will think you are doing the right thing?
That notion would not come into my head.
If you had my memories, you wouldn't go there or even think about it! What's the matter?
Of course, you'd never think of it to look at her.
He said last night he'd think of something.
Yes I did. And trust you to think of something like that.
Why think of something that had nothing to do with me!
He wouldn't think of coming in here for candy if he hadn't been a good boy.
That sounds to me like the kind of a favor that only a real nice girl would think of doing.
Why think of something that had nothing to do with me!
You wouldn't think so if you were to try it.
I don't think she thought that of me.
Now, what makes you think I'd think a thing like that?
There Was a time When I Wouldn't have thought twice about kissing a girl as pretty as you.
And next time before you put an innocent man under arrest, I'd think twice about it.
If I were you, I'd take a second look before going to a lawyer.
There Was a time When I Wouldn't have thought twice about kissing a girl as pretty as you.
And next time before you put an innocent man under arrest, I'd think twice about it.
If I were you, I'd take a second look before going to a lawyer.
I wouldn't want Mother to think so.
Somehow I knew you would think so.
You wouldn't think so, would you?
